G

GameBoard - Class in battleship
Displays the two boards, one with the players ships and one for the user to fire on.
GameBoard(GameMode) - Constructor for class battleship.GameBoard
Sets the gameMode to the current gameMode.
GameMode - Enum in battleship
Creates enum for different game modes.
getButtonGrid() - Static method in class battleship.Grid
Returns the grid of buttons.
getColumn() - Method in class battleship.Ship
Returns the column in the grid the start of the ship is located.
getHeightH() - Method in class battleship.Ship
Returns the height for horizontal orientation.
getHeightV() - Method in class battleship.Ship
Returns the height for vertical orientation.
getLabel(int, int) - Static method in class battleship.Grid
Returns a label at a certain coordinate.
getLabelGrid() - Static method in class battleship.Grid
Returns the grid of labels.
getRow() - Method in class battleship.Ship
Returns the row that the start of the ship is located.
getShipSize() - Method in class battleship.Ship
Returns the length of the ship.
getTypeOfShip() - Method in class battleship.Ship
Returns the type of ship to create.
getValue() - Method in class battleship.Ship
Returns the value of a specific ship.
getValues() - Method in class battleship.Grid
Returns the grid of values.
getWidthH() - Method in class battleship.Ship
Returns the width for horizontal orientation.
getWidthV() - Method in class battleship.Ship
Returns the width for vertical orientation.
Grid - Class in battleship
Creates a grid of JButtons that make up a board.
Grid(int, String) - Constructor for class battleship.Grid
Creates the board of a certain size and type.
